TEXT.TITLE: SOUTHERN NATIONAL CORP <SNAT.O> RAISING PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: Southern National Corp said its board approved increasing the dividend rate to 78 cts a year from 76 cts, effective with the next quarterly dividend which will be declared in July, payable August One. Reuter
